definition: to measure time/to time/to reckon by time
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
time trial (e.g. in cycle race)/timed race/competition against the clock
time rate wage/remuneration based on one's time and skill/opposite: piece rate wage 計件工資|计件工资[ji4 jian4 gong1 zi1]
time trial (e.g. in cycle race)/timed race/competition against the clock

sentences.english: This is Tick-Tock McGlaughlin live at Clocker's Corner.
sentences.chinese: 这里是滴答麦考林，在计时之角为你直播。

sentences.english: These clocks became the standard for global timekeeping.
sentences.chinese: 这些原子钟是全球计时的标准。

sentences.english: He started timing them with a stopwatch , and they got faster.
sentences.chinese: 他开始用秒表为他们计时，于是他们变快了。

sentences.english: After the boot countdown, the system automatically invokes the boot script.
sentences.chinese: 引导开始倒计时时，系统自动调用引导脚本。

sentences.english: Whatever comes out, you will see that on this timer.
sentences.chinese: 无论结果是什么，你会在计时器上看到。
这职员是计时算工资的。

sentences.english: New mechanic called vanishing which uses time counters on permanents.
sentences.chinese: 有个名为消散的机制会在永久物上使用计时指示物。

sentences.english: Our measurements of latency are all two-hop timings.
sentences.chinese: 我们衡量延迟的标准是两跳计时。

sentences.english: I still can't believe you didn't tell us about it, " said Ron grumpily ."
sentences.chinese: 你竟然不告诉我们有关计时器的事，我仍旧不能相信。

sentences.english: This new age mobile application Egg Timer will keep you roast tender and the smoke away.
sentences.chinese: 这个新时代的移动应用煮蛋计时器将让您烤嫩和烟了。

sentences.english: Sadowski can have video analysis and lap-timing services upon request.
sentences.chinese: 除此以外，还将会提供视频分析和单圈计时的服务。

sentences.english: This is the early knockings of this crisis.
sentences.chinese: 这是这次危机大爆发前的滴答计时声。

sentences.english: Electronic short-term timer up to 90 min.
sentences.chinese: 电子短期计时器达90分钟。

sentences.english: The bad news is that even as economic production slowly lifts off the floor, the economy is sitting on hours and wages.
sentences.chinese: 而坏消息是，依靠计时工资的收入增长缓慢。

sentences.english: Set your software timer to stop you every half hour or so.
sentences.chinese: 所以设置你的计时软件大约每半小时提醒你一次。

definition: dial or meter for displaying speed, time, or other measurements/cyclocomputer/code table (computing)
pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
roll-call (e.g. at athletics event)/check the record
variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
